Name: Liverpool City Library, Local Studies Collection

About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon-Fri 9am-5pm by appointment only; closed public holidays. General reference assistance available. Copying services available for books, journals, original records to A3, microfilms, photographs and newspapers. Referral to paid researchers is available.

About.Access: 1 week's advance notice of visit required.

About.Acquisition focus: Liverpool City area community archives:-business archives, family papers and photographs, society archives, maps and newspapers.
